
# Amiable
<div align=center>
  
<img src="https://heerheer.github.io/Amiable-Doc/Amiable_Icon.png" height="200" width="200"> </img>

一个Onebot标准的多框架兼容C# Bot开发SDK

![](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/heerheer/Amiable)
![](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/heerheer/Amiable)
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/OneBot-v11-black?logo=data:image/png;base64,)
  
![MQ适配器](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=MQ-Adapter&message=LTS-v1&color=0080FF&style=for-the-badge)
![Kum适配器](https://img.shields.io/badge/Kum--Adapter-???-green)
![XQ适配器](https://img.shields.io/badge/XQ--Adapter-S3-yellow)
![Lyp适配器](https://img.shields.io/badge/小羽+--Adapter-v1-yellow)
![小栗子适配器](https://img.shields.io/badge/Xlz--Adapter-1.0-gray)
![QQMini适配器](https://img.shields.io/badge/MiniBot--Adapter-v2-red)
 </div>
 
## 注意
下载前请确保您已经安装了.Net Framework 4.8 开发环境

https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-framework/net48
